security: Sharing details about personnel investigations, even with deletions, could compromise investigative methods or reveal sensitive information about individuals. The document notes it was 'RELEASED WITH DELETIONS'.
summary: This document is an exhibit cover sheet for a letter from the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) regarding David Reed Fromer, born on July 21, 1942, in Chicago, Illinois. The exhibit is part of a file maintained by the 113th Intelligence Corps Group, with the letter itself dated February 1, 1967, from the FBI in Milwaukee, Wisconsin.
summary_one_paragraph: An exhibit cover sheet from the Headquarters of the 113th Intelligence Corps Group in Chicago, Illinois, pertaining to David Reed Fromer (born July 21, 1942). The document references a letter dated February 1, 1967, from the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) in Milwaukee, Wisconsin. The cover sheet, part of file number 6353-6004 564-58-8137, indicates the document was regraded UNCLASSIFIED on September 2, 1994, with some deletions made upon release.
title: EXHIBIT COVER SHEET
